entry.title: MySQL
entry.content:
MySQLæ–°å»ºå”¯ä¸€ç´¢å¼•æ—¶æ˜¯ä¸åŒºåˆ†å¤§å°å†™çš„ï¼Œå¦‚æœéœ€è¦åŒºåˆ†éœ€è¦æ·»åŠ 
åŠ å”¯ä¸€ç´¢å¼•ï¼Œbinaryæ˜¯ä¸ºäº†è‹±æ–‡åŒºåˆ†å¤§å°å†™ï¼Œå› ä¸ºmysqlçš„å”¯ä¸€ç´¢å¼•ä¸åŒºåˆ†å¤§å°å†™

CREATE TABLE
Student
(
    id bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'ä¸»é”®',
    no VARCHAR(100) COMMENT 'å­¦å·',
    //åŠ å”¯ä¸€ç´¢å¼•ï¼Œbinaryæ˜¯ä¸ºäº†è‹±æ–‡åŒºåˆ†å¤§å°å†™ï¼Œå› ä¸ºmysqlçš„å”¯ä¸€ç´¢å¼•ä¸åŒºåˆ†å¤§å°å†™
    name VARCHAR(100) binary NOT NULL unique Â COMMENT 'å§“å'
    createdOn DATETIME COMMENT 'åˆ›å»ºæ—¶é—´',
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
)
ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='å­¦ç”Ÿè¡¨'

entry.title: C#ä»£ç ç‰‡æ®µ
entry.content:
/// <summary>
    /// å®ä½“è½¬æ¢å™¨
    /// </summary>
    public static class DefaultModelAdapter
    {
        /// <summary>
        /// å®ä½“è½¬æ¢å™¨(æŒ‡å®šåˆ—è½¬æ¢)
        /// </summary>
        /// <typeparam name="T">ç›®æ ‡å®ä½“</typeparam>
        /// <typeparam name="TSource">æºå®ä½“</typeparam>
        /// <param name="t">ç›®æ ‡å®ä½“</param>
        /// <param name="source">æºå®ä½“</param>
        /// <param name="express">æŒ‡å®šéœ€è¦å°†æºå®ä½“çš„å­—æ®µèµ‹å€¼ç»™ç›®æ ‡å®ä½“çš„å­—æ®µ(ä¸ä¼ é»˜è®¤å…¨éƒ¨æ›¿æ¢)</param>
        public static void Transfer<T, TSource>(T t, TSource source, params Expression<Func<T, object>>[] express)
        {
            // æºå®ä½“çš„æ‰€æœ‰å­—æ®µ
            var sourceValues = source.GetType().GetProperties();
            // ç›®æ ‡å®ä½“çš„æ‰€æœ‰å­—æ®µ
            var targetVaules = t.GetType().GetProperties();
            // è·å–æ‰€æœ‰éœ€è¦æ›¿æ¢çš„å­—æ®µåç§°
            var columnNames = express.Select(item => GetPropName(item.Body)).ToList();
            // éœ€è¦æ›´æ–°çš„é”®å€¼å¯¹
            var updates = sourceValues.Where(pi => columnNames.Contains(pi.Name)).ToDictionary(pi => pi.Name, pi => pi.GetValue(source, null));
            // æ›´æ–°
            foreach (var item in updates)
            {
                foreach (var pi in targetVaules)
                {
                    if (pi.Name == item.Key)
                    {
                        pi.SetValue(t, item.Value);
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// å®ä½“è½¬æ¢å™¨(å…¨éƒ¨è½¬æ¢)
        /// </summary>
        /// <typeparam name="T">ç›®æ ‡å®ä½“</typeparam>
        /// <typeparam name="TSource">æºå®ä½“</typeparam>
        /// <param name="t">ç›®æ ‡å®ä½“</param>
        /// <param name="source">æºå®ä½“</param>
        public static void Transfer<T, TSource>(T t, TSource source)
        {
            // æºå®ä½“çš„æ‰€æœ‰å­—æ®µ
            var sourceValues = source.GetType().GetProperties();
            // ç›®æ ‡å®ä½“çš„æ‰€æœ‰å­—æ®µ
            var targetVaules = t.GetType().GetProperties();
            // éœ€è¦æ›´æ–°çš„é”®å€¼å¯¹
            var updates = sourceValues.ToDictionary(pi => pi.Name, pi => pi.GetValue(source, null));
            // æ›´æ–°
            foreach (var item in updates)
            {
                foreach (var pi in targetVaules)
                {
                    if (pi.Name == item.Key)
                    {
                        pi.SetValue(t, item.Value);
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Lambdaè¡¨è¾¾å¼è½¬æ¢
        /// </summary>
        /// <param name="express"></param>
        /// <returns></returns>
        public static string GetPropName(Expression express)
        {
            var str = string.Empty;
            if (express is MemberExpression)
            {
                str = ((MemberExpression) express).Member.Name;
            }
            else if (express is UnaryExpression)
            {
                str = ((MemberExpression) ((UnaryExpression) express).Operand).Member.Name;
            }
            else if (express is ParameterExpression)
            {
                str = ((ParameterExpression) express).Type.Name;
            }
            return str;
        }
    }

entry.title: SqlServeræŸ¥ç”¨SQL
entry.content:
æŸ¥è¯¢SqlServerç´¢å¼•

SELECT   ç´¢å¼•åç§°=a.name  
,è¡¨å=c.name  
,ç´¢å¼•å­—æ®µå=d.name  
,ç´¢å¼•å­—æ®µä½ç½®=d.colid  
FROM   sysindexes   a  
JOIN   sysindexkeys   b   ON   a.id=b.id   AND   a.indid=b.indid  
JOIN   sysobjects   c   ON   b.id=c.id  
JOIN   syscolumns   d   ON   b.id=d.id   AND   b.colid=d.colid  
WHERE   a.indid   NOT IN(0,255)  
-- and   c.xtype='U'   and   c.status>0 --æŸ¥æ‰€æœ‰ç”¨æˆ·è¡¨  
AND   c.name='tableName' --æŸ¥æŒ‡å®šè¡¨  
ORDER BY   c.name,a.name,d.name

æ•°æ®åº“è¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢

SELECT  
d.name è¡¨å,
a.colorder å­—æ®µåºå·,
a.name å­—æ®µå,
b.name ç±»å‹,
a.length å ç”¨å­—èŠ‚æ•°,
COLUMNPROPERTY(a.id,a.name,'PRECISION') AS é•¿åº¦,
ISNULL(e.text,'') é»˜è®¤å€¼,
ISNULL(g.[value],'') AS å­—æ®µè¯´æ˜
FROM syscolumns a
LEFT JOIN systypes b ON a.xtype=b.xusertype
INNER JOIN sysobjects d ON a.id=d.id AND d.xtype='U' AND d.name <>'dtproperties'
LEFT JOIN syscomments e ON a.cdefault=e.id
LEFT JOIN sys.extended_properties g  ON a.id=g.major_id AND a.colid = g.minor_id
WHERE d.name='tableName'
ORDER BY a.id,a.colorder

entry.title: åˆ©ç”¨Pythonç”ŸæˆC#å®ä½“
entry.content:
# -*- coding: UTF-8 -*-

import pymysql


def TypeChange(typeName):
    if typeName == "bigint":
        return "long"
    elif typeName == "varchar":
        return "string"
    elif typeName == "datetime":
        return "DateTime"
    elif typeName == "int":
        return "int"
    elif typeName == "decimal":
        return "decimal"
    else:
        return ""


def ColumnNameChange(columnName, prefix):
    if len(columnName) < len(prefix):
        return columnName
    elif columnName[0:len(prefix)] == prefix:
        return columnName[len(prefix):len(columnName)]
    else:
        return columnName


tableName = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥è¡¨åï¼š")
dataModelName = input("è¯·è¾“å…¥å®ä½“åç§°ï¼š")
prefix = input("å­—æ®µå‰ç¼€åï¼š")

# æ–°å»ºæ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
conn = pymysql.connect(
    host='',
    port=,
    user='',
    password='',
    db='',
    charset='utf8')
# 2è·å–æ¸¸æ ‡
cursor = conn.cursor()
# 3æ‰§è¡ŒæŸ¥è¯¢ï¼Œå¹¶è·å–æŸ¥è¯¢çš„æ€»è¡Œæ•°
rowNums = cursor.execute('''SELECT COLUMN_NAME åˆ—å,  
COLUMN_TYPE æ•°æ®ç±»å‹,  
DATA_TYPE å­—æ®µç±»å‹,  
CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH é•¿åº¦,  
IS_NULLABLE æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º,  
COLUMN_DEFAULT é»˜è®¤å€¼,  
COLUMN_COMMENT å¤‡æ³¨   
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS 
where table_name = "''' + tableName + '''" ''')

# 4.éå†ç»“æœï¼Œè·å–æŸ¥è¯¢çš„ç»“æœ
newtxt = '''
/// <summary>
/// ''' + tableName + '''
/// </summary>
[Table("''' + tableName + '''")]
public class ''' + dataModelName + '''
{
    XXXX
}
'''
innertxt = ''
ResultList = cursor.fetchall()
for i in range(len(ResultList)):
    innertxt = innertxt + '''
    /// <summary>
    /// %s
    /// </summary>
    [Column("%s")]
    [DisplayName("%s")]
    public %s %s { get; set; }
    ''' % (ResultList[i][6], ResultList[i][0], ResultList[i][6],
           TypeChange(ResultList[i][2]), 
           ColumnNameChange(ResultList[i][0], prefix))

    # print(ResultList[i])
# æäº¤å¦‚æœéœ€è¦æ’å…¥è¯­å¥çš„æ—¶å€™ä½¿ç”¨commit
# conn.commit()
# å…³é—­
cursor.close()
conn.close()

f = open(dataModelName + '.cs', mode="w", encoding="utf8")
f.write(newtxt.replace("XXXX", innertxt))
f.flush()
f.close()

print("ç”Ÿæˆå®Œæˆ")

entry.title: Hello Gridea
entry.content:
ğŸ‘ æ¬¢è¿ä½¿ç”¨ Gridea ï¼
âœï¸ Gridea ä¸€ä¸ªé™æ€åšå®¢å†™ä½œå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ã€‚ä½ å¯ä»¥ç”¨å®ƒæ¥è®°å½•ä½ çš„ç”Ÿæ´»ã€å¿ƒæƒ…ã€çŸ¥è¯†ã€ç¬”è®°ã€åˆ›æ„... ...

Github
Gridea ä¸»é¡µ
ç¤ºä¾‹ç½‘ç«™

ç‰¹æ€§ğŸ‘‡

ğŸ“ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨æœ€é…·çš„ Markdown è¯­æ³•ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œå¿«é€Ÿåˆ›ä½œ

ğŸŒ‰ ä½ å¯ä»¥ç»™æ–‡ç« é…ä¸Šç²¾ç¾çš„å°é¢å›¾å’Œåœ¨æ–‡ç« ä»»æ„ä½ç½®æ’å…¥å›¾ç‰‡

ğŸ·ï¸ ä½ å¯ä»¥å¯¹æ–‡ç« è¿›è¡Œæ ‡ç­¾åˆ†ç»„

ğŸ“‹ ä½ å¯ä»¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰èœå•ï¼Œç”šè‡³å¯ä»¥åˆ›å»ºå¤–éƒ¨é“¾æ¥èœå•

ğŸ’» ä½ å¯ä»¥åœ¨ ğ–¶ğ—‚ğ—‡ğ–½ğ—ˆğ—ğ—Œ æˆ– ğ–¬ğ–ºğ–¼ğ–®ğ–² è®¾å¤‡ä¸Šä½¿ç”¨æ­¤å®¢æˆ·ç«¯

ğŸŒ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ ğ–¦ğ—‚ğ—ğ—ğ—ğ–» ğ–¯ğ–ºğ—€ğ–¾ğ—Œ æˆ– Coding Pages å‘ä¸–ç•Œå±•ç¤ºï¼Œæœªæ¥å°†æ”¯æŒæ›´å¤šå¹³å°

ğŸ’¬ ä½ å¯ä»¥è¿›è¡Œç®€å•çš„é…ç½®ï¼Œæ¥å…¥ Gitalk æˆ– DisqusJS è¯„è®ºç³»ç»Ÿ

ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ä¸­æ–‡ç®€ä½“æˆ–è‹±è¯­

ğŸŒ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä»»æ„ä½¿ç”¨åº”ç”¨å†…é»˜è®¤ä¸»é¢˜æˆ–ä»»æ„ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹ä¸»é¢˜ï¼Œå¼ºå¤§çš„ä¸»é¢˜è‡ªå®šä¹‰èƒ½åŠ›

ğŸ–¥ ä½ å¯ä»¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰æºæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨ OneDriveã€ç™¾åº¦ç½‘ç›˜ã€iCloudã€Dropbox ç­‰è¿›è¡Œå¤šè®¾å¤‡åŒæ­¥

ğŸŒ± å½“ç„¶ Gridea è¿˜å¾ˆå¹´è½»ï¼Œæœ‰å¾ˆå¤šä¸è¶³ï¼Œä½†è¯·ç›¸ä¿¡ï¼Œå®ƒä¼šä¸åœå‘å‰ğŸƒ

æœªæ¥ï¼Œå®ƒä¸€å®šä¼šæˆä¸ºä½ ç¦»ä¸å¼€çš„ä¼™ä¼´

å°½æƒ…å‘æŒ¥ä½ çš„æ‰åå§ï¼

ğŸ˜˜ Enjoy~
